title: Former Nelson Mandela prison guard Christo Brand to speak at UNC-Chapel Hill’s Friday Center on ...
text: ( Source : The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill ) For immediate use Former Nelson Mandela prison guard Christo Brand to speak at UNC-Chapel Hill 's Friday Center on Nov. 11 (Chapel Hill, N.C. - Oct. 12, 2015 ) - Christo Brand, Nelson
